description: This file defines the Checkout React component, managing the checkout flow including shipping information form, order review, and order placement logic with API integration and navigation.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Asynchronous function to submit the order to the backend API, handle success and error cases, clear cart, and navigate to orders page.

calls: navigate('/orders', { state: { placed: true, id: order.id } })
navigate('/orders', { state: { placed: true, id: Math.floor(Math.random()*100000) } })
